#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int main(){
    int t,n,p,q,i,n1;
    char str[109];
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
       scanf("%s",str);
       scanf("%d %d",&p,&q);
       n=strlen(str);
       int mark[150]={0};
       for(i=0;i<n;++i)
           mark[str[i]]+=1;
       for(i=97;i<=122;++i)
           mark[i]*=p;
       int sum=0;
       for(i=97;i<=122;++i)
           sum+=mark[i];
       while(q--){
           scanf("%d",&n1);
           if(n1>sum)
              printf("-1\n");
           else{
              int count=0;
              for(i=97;i<=122;++i){
                   count=count+mark[i];
                   if(count>=n1){
                      printf("%c\n",i);
                      break;
                   }
              }
           }
       }
    }
    return 0;
}
